meanings.sent1: She enjoys prologing her stories with interesting details.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is prologing the lesson with a brief history of the topic.
meanings.sent3: By prologing the party with a magic show, everyone was amazed.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like prologing sunshine after a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations prologing a festive atmosphere to the event.

meanings.definition: The act of providing an introduction or preface
meanings.sent1: The prologing of the book gave readers a glimpse into the story.
meanings.sent2: Her prologing of the event set the tone for the evening.
meanings.sent3: The prologing of the play was so dramatic that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The prologing of the movie was like a bright spotlight on the main character.
meanings.sent5: His prologing of the speech made it unforgettable to the audience.
